mapper.select: SELECT tt.id, date_format(tt.meeting_date,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') meetingDateStr, tt.meeting_notes meetingNotes, tt.reason_other reasonOther, tt.file_key fileKey, tt.file_length fileLength, tt.bucket_name bucketName, tt.file_name fileName, dct1.dict_value meetingResultId, dct1.dict_code meetingResultCode, dct1.`name` meetingResult, dct2.dict_value resultReasonId, dct2.dict_code resultReasonCode, dct2.`name` resultReason FROM( SELECT r.id, case r.meeting_type WHEN 'meetingType:3' THEN 'meeting3Result' WHEN 'meetingType:5' THEN 'meeting5Result' WHEN 'meetingType:1' THEN 'meeting1Result' WHEN 'meetingType:4' THEN 'meeting4Result' else 'meetingResult' end meetingType, case WHEN locate('Veto',r.result_reason)>0 THEN 'meetingVetoReason' WHEN locate('Undetermined',r.result_reason)>0 THEN 'meetingUndeterminedReason' WHEN locate('Following',r.result_reason)>0 THEN 'meetingFollowingReason' else '' end resultReason, r.meeting_result, r.result_reason, r.meeting_date, r.meeting_notes, r.reason_other, sf.file_key, sf.file_length, sf.bucket_name, sf.file_name FROM sop_meeting_record r left join sop_file sf on sf.id=r.file_id WHERE r.id=#{id} )tt LEFT JOIN dict dct1 ON dct1.parent_code=tt.meetingType and dct1.dict_code=tt.meeting_result LEFT JOIN dict dct2 ON dct2.parent_code=tt.resultReason and dct2.dict_code=tt.result_reason;
